content: उष्ण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [उष्-नक् <ls>Uṇ. 3. 2</ls>] {@--1@} Hot, warm; °अंशुः, °करः &c. {@--2@} Sharp, strict, active; आददे नातिशीतोष्णो नभस्वानिव दक्षिणः <ls>R. 4. 8</ls> (where उष्ण has sense {@--1@} also). {@--3@} Pungent, acrid (as a रस). {@--4@} Clever, sharp. {@--5@} Choleric, warm, passionate. --ष्णः, --ष्णं {@--1@} Heat, warmth. {@--2@} The hot season (ग्रीष्म); <ls>Ms. 11. 114.</ls> {@--3@} Sunshine. {@--4@} A deep or feverish sigh. --ष्णः An onion. --ष्णा {@--1@} Warmth, heat. {@--2@} Consumption. {@--3@} Bile.
उष्ण, उष्णक, उष्मन् see under उष्.
